sentences.sContent: It will close more than 200 stores nationwide resulting in the layoffs of an estimated 2,000 employees.
sentences.sCn: 在全国范围内将关闭二百多家商店，造成约两千人失业。

words.tran: 中断期间，中途短暂的停留；终点停车处；津贴

trans.tranOther: When there are layoffs in a company, people become unemployed because there is no more work for them in the company
